Sharing

By: Irene Cassarino
14-11-2012
backend

I’ve just realized that today is the national sharing day.
Uhm.
It made me think about what sharing really means for us. My daily answer sits at my right, and has a name: Gian Luca, the founder of Gnammo.

30 min ago I’ve got a call from Gian Luca:
GL:”Ire, may I pass by and work a bit from there?”
I:”Of corse you can, we’re waiting for you”

2 min later the doorbell rang and Gian Luca took the sit of Pier, who is now giving his weekly lecture about Infoviz.

Gnammo is also about sharing (tastes, cooking skills, time, conversations…).

So what: sharing can be a matter of culture, attitude, intimate pleasure and even business model.

For sure, if you are for it, you don’t share just for one day.

Read More

Regalister red dress for Android!

By: Irene Cassarino
14-11-2012
Regalister

Time has passed since the first epic release, and Regalister keeps growing and collecting successes.

The IPhone version has got excellent reviews (almost all 5 stars) and now features into the best apps on the ITunes store in its own category (Trends and fashion).

While the ITunes store delivers the version 1.2 (a bunch of much appreciated bug fixes), CEO Davide Bertarini has taken advantage of the incoming holiday (and gift, indeed!) season to release the first Android version, with new exclusive red dress for Christmas!

Now you have no excuses: whether you are an Apple or Google fanatic, download Regalister and enhance your social shopping experience!
With Regalister, you will never ever get wrong gifts


[a giant screenshot from my giant Note2]

#IxDT n.4

By: Irene Cassarino
14-11-2012
#ixdt, backend

The set up was slightly challenging (see pics below of the ‘plastered’ projector and of Pier-MacGyver in action), but at the end everything went well, a lot of new and beautiful people came, the location was cool and the welcoming warm&friendly.
You can grasp the presentation from here.

A big thanks to all that came – and to all that didn’t manage to make it as well! We are waiting for all of you at the second event of the season, on Tuesday the 11th of December, same time and location – Società Anonima, h.19: we’ll talk about gamification tactics of user engagement.

#IxDT – the new season

By: Irene Cassarino
07-11-2012
#ixdt

Per esempio, non crederete mica che…

  • Mito 1: Solo con un sito “figo” puoi avere successo
  • Mito 2: Le nicchie sature non sono più profittevoli
  • Mito 3: E’ fondamentale mettere il “mi piace” su Facebook
  • Mito 4: I metatag sono importantissimi per essere riconosciuti da google
  • Mito 5: Il CSS non può essere ordinato
  • Mito 6: Il Social Media Marketing serve ad aumentare le vendite
  • Mito 7: non c’è niente da guadagnare dalle piccole chiaccherate con gli utenti

Vi aspettiamo alla Società Anonima in via Pietro Micca 12, a Torino, alle 19, per parlarne attorno ad un aperitivo con Claudio Petrarulo, esperto di SEO e Web Marketing.
Prenotate il vostro posto qui!

La nuova stagione degli Interaction Design Tuesdays si apre martedì 13 novembre e continua ogni secondo martedì del mese (quindi l’11 dicembre, il 15 gennaio etc). Il calendario completo è ancora da definire, ma sappiamo già che il 15 dicembre si parlerà di Gamification.
Non mancate!

About

Either it's bad luck, or bright destiny.

We are doers. Internet enthusiasts, passionate about design&coding, humble learners and bold explorers.
We love start-ups.
